type.name: org.gradle.plugins.ear.descriptor.EarSecurityRole
type.description: A security-role element in a deployment descriptor like application.xml.

method.name: getDescription
method.description: A description of the security role. Optional.

method.name: getRoleName
method.description: The name of the security role. Required.

property.name: roleName
property.description: The name of the security role. Required.

property.name: description
property.description: A description of the security role. Optional.
